#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{	
char s[101]={'\0'};
long long int n,sum,j;
int q,t,i,length;
long int p;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
long long int str[30]={0};
scanf("%s",s);
scanf("%ld %d",&p,&q);
i=0;
length=0;
while(s[i]!='\0')
{
str[s[i]-96]++;
length++;
i++;
}
i=0;
for(j=1;j<=q;j++)
{
scanf("%lld",&n);
if(n>p*length)
cout<<"-1\n";
else
{ 
sum=0;
i=1;
while(sum<n)
{
sum+=p*str[i];
i++;
}
printf("%c\n",(i+95));
}
}
}
return 0;
}
